comments:
Select a valid Embedded mapping that has the @Embedded annotation on it.  In the persistence properties view select Map As -> Default (Embedded) and you get this exception and the Embedded annotation is not removed:

java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.dali.orm.impl.EmbeddedMappingImpl
	at org.eclipse.dali.orm.impl.PersistentAttributeImpl.setAttributeMappingKey(PersistentAttributeImpl.java:225)
	at org.eclipse.dali.ui.views.PersistentAttributeComposite.selectionChanged(PersistentAttributeComposite.java:194)
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.Viewer$2.run(Viewer.java:162)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.SafeRunner.run(SafeRunner.java:37)
Fixed in M7 with changes to model
